title: Sorry
lyrics:
Baby jeongmal-iji
Neol ilhgo sipji anh-a
Nae mam-eun neol yeojeonhi wonhago tto wonhae
Soljighi nado da teol-eonohgo sipji
Saeng-gaghaebwa neoui geu mam-i

Meol-eojyeoman ganeunde



Jogeumman deo gidalyeojwo

Bunmyeong gwaenchanh-ajil tenikka

Jogeumman deo jikyeo bwajwo

Bunmyeong nan gochyeojil tenikka



I’m sorry yojeum-e

Naega neomu manh-i himdeulge haessji

I’m sorry My baby I’m sorry



Mal-eobs-i ulgo issneun naui moseub-i

Eolmana neol oelobge halji

Nado algo iss-eo



Jogeumman deo gidalyeojwo

Jeonbu da dollyeonoh-eul tenikka

Jogeumman deo jikyeobwa jwo

Bunmyeong nan gochyeojil tenikka



I’m sorry yojeum-e

Naega neomu manh-i himdeulge haessji

I’m sorry My baby I’m sorry

But hold me ileoda

Jeongmal michyeobeolil geos gat-aseo

Neomu geob-i na

Hold me don’t leave me



Beotyeonael su iss-eul geola mid-eo

Da jinagal geolago

Eodum-i geodhimyeon dasigeum

Tto uliga boil geolago

I’m sorry al-a naega neol

Neomu manh-i seulpeuge haji

I’m sorry My baby I’m sorry

But save me ileoda

Jeongmal michyeobeolil geos gat-aseo

Neomu geob-i na

Hold me don’t leave me



I’m sorry

I’m sorry

I’m sorry



But hold me

Save me
